document.full_text: portugal's two key opposition parties signaled after meeting european and imf officials on wednesday they will back a 78-billion-euro bailout that is expected to consign the economy to two years of recession.
document.title: portugal opposition set to back bailout
lines_and_colors: portugal's two key opposition parties signaled after meeting european and imf officials on wednesday they will back a 78-billion-euro bailout that is expected to consign the economy to two years of recession.
